com.mygdx.game.testers

Class JUnitMapTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.testers.JUnitMapTest

  • public class JUnitMapTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests the map class note: all coordinates are based off of a bottom left origin
    Version:
    May 30, 2015
    Author:
    Nathan Lui, Period: 4, Assignment: my-gdx-game-core, Sources: libgdx, junit4

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean checkRectangle(int x, int y, int w, int h, boolean shouldBe, boolean[][] b)
      Checks whether given array has a rectangle Preconditions: rectangle is not outside of array
      static boolean checkRoom(int x, int y, int w, int h, boolean shouldBe, boolean[][] b)
      Checks whether given array has a room Preconditions: x >= 0 and y >= 0
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Runs the JUnit tester
      static junit.framework.Test suite()
      Returns this testing class for testing
      void testConversion()
      Tests the tileToPixel() and pixelToTile() conversions
      void testMapGeneration()
      Tests the map's static portion of random generation random generation must maintain a border of walls map should start out as all walls when first initialized
      void testMapRecursion()
      Tests all the map's recursive methods: createRoom(): creates a rectangular room given x,y,w,h createBox(): creates a rectangle (inside not touched) given x,y,w,h sizeOfArea(): returns the size of Area fillArea: fills an area hasPath(): returns whether 2 points can be connected
      void testSpawn()
      Limited testing of the spawn x, y -coordinates, makes sure spawn point is valid (not in a wall) and not too close to given coordinate tests the setSpawn() method
      void testWallCollision()
      Tests the isCollidingWithWall() method in the map class

      • checkRoom

        public static boolean checkRoom(int x,
                int y,
                int w,
                int h,
                boolean shouldBe,
                boolean[][] b)
        Checks whether given array has a room Preconditions: x >= 0 and y >= 0
        Parameters:
        x - starting coordinate
        y - starting coordinate
        w - width of room
        h - height of room
        shouldBe - boolean state that the room should be
        b - 2D array of booleans to check
        Returns:
        true if all tiles in designated spots in array are what they shouldBe

      • checkRectangle

        public static boolean checkRectangle(int x,
                     int y,
                     int w,
                     int h,
                     boolean shouldBe,
                     boolean[][] b)
        Checks whether given array has a rectangle Preconditions: rectangle is not outside of array
        Parameters:
        x - starting coordinate
        y - starting coordinate
        w - width of rectangle
        h - height of rectangle
        shouldBe - boolean that the rectangle should be
        b - 2D array of booleans to check
        Returns:
        true if all tiles in designated spots in array are what they shouldBe
